The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
First of all I would like to say a massive thank you to all those who attended the Primary Parents Information Day last week. It was well attended and I am glad that we could share an insight into next year at the British School of Guangzhou.
I hope you found it useful, but more than this, I want to get the message across that we are incredibly keen for parents to be more involved in school life. This is why I am making a second plea for people to sign-up to be part of a Parent Teacher Association. For example we are currently setting out our strategic vision for the school for the next 10 years and would love to ask a group of parents to give us their thoughts on what direction they feel we should be heading.
Thank you to those that signed up on Thursday. However, if you still havenâ€™t signed up but would like to, then please email me with your interest.
I will hold an initial meeting in August for parents so we can get the association up and running. More details about time and venue will follow to those who put their names forward.
Thank you for your continuing support for Primary and the wider school community.
Kindest regards
David Laird
Head of Primary
The British School of Guangzhou
